timeline.bodyText: Why is this change made? It actually doesn't make sense to me, because you're using an static method of KPrint(), so it seems that we shouldn't need to declare a new one.
timeline.author: ehildenb

replies.bodyText:
I used IntelliJ's autofix and didn't notice it added the new instantiation.
I've pushed a fix so please have another look.
replies.author: radumereuta
